info.name: Discord Dark Theme [V1.0.2]
info.description: Is the default Discord dark theme not dark enough for you? Then try this style! This style makes Discord even darker. Warning: This style will break if you have the Light Theme enabled in Discord. Make sure to put Discord on dark!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.2
The Custom Status box is now darker.
Warnings at the top of the screen are now dark.
The Server Boost screen is now darker.

Version 1.0.1
The background of the gif chooser now matches other popups.
Server invites now match other backgrounds.
The Call background now matches other backgrounds.

Version 1.0
Initial release.
